title: HPE security advisory (AV26-046)
description: On January 20, 2026, HPE published a security advisory to address a vulnerability in the following products:
products: HPE Alletra 6000   versions prior to 6.1.2.800, version 6.1.3 versions prior to 6.1.3.300
HPE Nimble Storage Hybrid Flash Arrays   versions prior to 6.1.2.800, version 6.1.3 versions prior to 6.1.3.300
Nimble Storage All Flash Arrays   versions prior to 6.1.2.800, version 6.1.3 versions prior to 6.1.3.300
HPE Alletra 5000   versions prior to 6.1.2.800, version 6.1.3 versions prior to 6.1.3.300
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
